product_name: Komperdell Traveller Carbon Walking Staff - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Traveller Carbon Walking Staff folds down to an extremely small packed size and serves double duty with its convenient camera mount system. Staff folds down to 49cm for packing and telescopes from 115 - 145 cm. Telescoping Titanal aluminum alloy upper shafts feature a Power Lock II lock mechanism, offering an easy and secure fixing with only 1 click. Carbon lower shafts feature a foldable Approach 1.0 mechanism. Detachable full EVA foam grip with camera mount system is heat-insulating and lighterweight than a traditional grip. Camera Mount System changes the staff into a camera stand; simply screw the grip off and screw the camera on. Trekking basket/tip construction with a pivoting ball mechanism allows for optimal adjustment to any terrain. The Komperdell Traveller Carbon Walking Staff features a tungsten carbide tip and comfortable strap band. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Traveller Carbon Walking Staff folds down to an extremely small packed size and serves double duty with its convenient camera mount system.
